title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select items at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first try.

Observed Behavior: The label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Expected Behavior: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
3. The label item cannot be selected on the first try.
4. On the second attempt, the label item can be selected.
OB: The label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
EB: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt.
SR:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
3. The label item cannot be selected on the first try.
4. On the second attempt, the label item can be selected.
